justification: Technical expertise score reflects strong experience in automation but lacks specific power system analysis exposure.
Power system analysis is indirectly covered through control system integration experiences in Oil & Gas industry.
Excellent soft skills demonstrated through client communication and project leadership roles in multinational environments.
Macro leadership score reflects his leadership aspirations but lacks direct team-leading experiences in electrical engineering projects.

requirements.criteria: Advanced knowledge of automation tools and data visualization platforms

input.job_description:
### Lead Engineer at TechInnovate Solutions

**Join our innovative team at TechInnovate Solutions as a Lead Engineer, where you'll oversee and drive multiple engineering teams to deliver cutting-edge solutions in the field of Electrical & Electronics Engineering.**

#### Key Responsibilities:
- Lead the system studies team and coordinate with the design team to ensure high-quality project deliverables.
- Provide technical support and guidance to project teams for optimal performance.
- Oversee engineering projects from conception to completion, ensuring alignment with client expectations and timelines.
- Conduct comprehensive training programs to enhance the technical skills of team members.
- Utilize advanced knowledge of software and technologies to conduct power system analysis.
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to achieve project objectives and deliver exceptional results.

#### Qualifications:
- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering. A PhD is preferred.
- 8 to 10 years of relevant experience in power system analysis and project management.
- Proven track record in leading engineering teams and projects effectively.

#### Location:
- Remote work available with occasional travel to company offices in the US, UAE, and other global locations.
- Relocation assistance available for qualified candidates.
minimum_requirements: Advanced knowledge of automation tools and data visualization platforms

details.executive_summary: Muhammad Mudasir is a skilled Project Engineer and Site Services Engineer with over 5 years of experience in the Oil and Gas industry, specializing in Control System integration services. He possesses a strong technical background in programming, automation, and project management, and is dedicated to delivering innovative solutions and driving organizational success.

employment_history.details: Pre-Commissioning & Commissioning, DCS/PLC programming and HMI development and Testing, System design, hardware and software design under supervision of PM/Project Lead.
Maintain/Develop Dashboards for Cost/Resource usage, Analyze Planned VS projected Cost & Planned VS Actual resource usage, Develop VBA/MS Flows for efficient flow of process.
Training includes PLCs Programming, DCS & SCADA, Control System Panels, Software and HMI designing.
